page.title: 04Industry.
page.content: These are the industries in our block. Local shops. Antique shop. Farming. Garden Centre. Brewery. Builders. Two of the shops in our block are just general stores, one of them also acts as a Post Office. The antique shop sells a large variety of goods,especially things made out of brass. There is also a small collection of pictures and old furniture. There are some china items also on display. There are six main builders on our block. Most of them just do general repairs,but one of them builds houses and is a much larger company than the others. Agriculture is the main industry in our block. The brewery has just opened up in our village,it sells real ale.My teacher says it tastes great! One of our local shops has just closed down. It has been turned into a Tea Room.
